Package com.ezasm.assembler

Class Assembler

java.lang.Object
com.ezasm.assembler.parser.EzASMBaseListener
com.ezasm.assembler.Assembler
All Implemented Interfaces:
EzASMListener, org.antlr.v4.runtime.tree.ParseTreeListener
public class Assembler extends EzASMBaseListener
State machine implementation of an assembler. This class is only accessible through assemble(java.lang.String, FileOutputStream), which creates an instance to store state. This class is used to convert a String containing EzASM assembler instructions into a MIPS32 executable file. This class extends EzASMBaseListener and uses listener methods to assemble the instructions parsed with ANTLR. The overall state of the assembler is defined in sections, which contains the data to be stored in each section of the generated executable. The assembler contains public methods that can be accessed exclusively by InstructionDispatcher during the generation of Directives. Generated directives are parsed in a series of passes and use public Assembler methods to modify the state of the assembler as it generates the executable.

    • enterExpr

      public void enterExpr(EzASMParser.ExprContext ctx)
      Parses an EzASM expression. In the case of a label definition, an appropriate label is created. In the case of an instruction call, all arguments are parsed, and generated Directives are added to directives. All parsed Arguments are added to args before calling InstructionDispatcher.execute(ArrayList) on the parsed instruction with the parsed Arguments.
      Specified by:
      enterExpr in interface EzASMListener
      Overrides:
      enterExpr in class EzASMBaseListener
      Parameters:
      ctx - the parse tree
      Throws:
      AssemblerException - if the specified instruction is undefined or if the parsed Arguments do not match the instruction definition.

    • enterArgument

      public void enterArgument(EzASMParser.ArgumentContext ctx)
      Parses an argument within an EzASM expression context. The generated Argument is added to args.
      Specified by:
      enterArgument in interface EzASMListener
      Overrides:
      enterArgument in class EzASMBaseListener
      Parameters:
      ctx - the parse tree
      Throws:
      AssemblerException - if an Argument.Register or Argument.Dereference has an invalid register identifier, or if an Argument.Dereference has a non-integer offset.
